items.title: Montreal Construction & Renovation Experts
items.description: Dilamco is your trusted general contractor for residential and commercial construction, renovation, and disaster recovery services.

With over 20 years of experience serving Montreal and surrounding areas, Dilamco has built a reputation for excellence in construction and renovation. Our team of skilled professionals is committed to delivering high-quality results on time and within budget.

We take pride in our attention to detail, use of premium materials, and dedication to customer satisfaction. From small renovations to large-scale construction projects, we approach each job with the same level of care and professionalism.
